name: places/ChIJEQ2W1o1ZwokRdBlfiuXosX8
formattedAddress: 448 W Broadway, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 448 W Broadway, New York, NY 10012-3232, USA

originalText.text: Honestly, I came here because it was close by my dermatology appt and it has really good reviews online. I’m not sure why I broke out after I got my arms waxed, and maybe it was because of something on my skin but I’ve been strip waxing and sugaring my arms for years and have never had this problem. Not sure if the wax had something my skin reacted to but this is definitely frustrating as it has never happened before.

text.text: Honestly, I came here because it was close by my dermatology appt and it has really good reviews online. originalText.text:
I got my eyebrows and upper lip threaded with Jassi. Caveat: the brows themselves are well-done and symmetrical if you consider them outside of the context of my face and my threading request.

Jassi didn't listen to my request to keep the eyebrows natural. She asked if she could make them thinner and I said a tiny bit, just to clean them up.
Jassi then proceeded to make them significantly thinner and make my arch higher. I didn't ask for any sort of re-shaping.

When I saw them in the mirror, I was pretty stunned. I asked her why they were more arched and thin, and she said "this shape is better with your round face." OK, but I had a mask on and she hadn't seen my face. I also didn't appreciate that she took these liberties with my brows when I expressly requested otherwise - and she also didn't tell me before she started threading that she'd be changing them so drastically.

I tipped and paid without complaining because I just figured I was overreacting. But since then, friends told me "yeah they're really arched now" and "you look like you stepped out of an early 2000s movie set."

I’ve reached out via email to rectify the situation with them directly, but have not gotten a response. I only share this as a caution for future customers — be very insistent on the kind of brows you want!!

The upper lip threading was fine.

originalText.text: I've been going to Hibba Beauty NYC for years. Hibba (the owner) and her sweet and attentive staff are the BEST for hair removal and brow shaping. I trust her completely, and have been a longtime customer and fan of her work. The only thing I haven't tried is microblading there, but I don't really need this service...YET!  The space is super cute too and frida kahlo inspired. Very cozy and cheerful, just like Hibba herself.

The space is super cute too and frida kahlo inspired. Very cozy and cheerful, just like Hibba herself.

originalText.text: This is one of the best place to get a laser hair removal treatment. I have used Hibba Salon’s for laser hair removal treatment for face and the lady bits and it has been a very painless hassle free experience. The staff is very well trained and professional. My asthetician took the time to explain the process and ensured that I was comfortable during the treatment. I have used other places in the past to get the laser treatment for some of other body parts and and in comparison my experience at Hibba’s salon has been great. I highly recommend this service at the salon.

originalText.text: I have had laser sessions at a couple places before but my session with Hibba has been the best experience I have ever had. I am usually very nervous about the pain and she was extremely patient with me and did so well that I barely felt any pain. She was also thorough to make sure there are no patches left. Highly recommend her services !
